keyPolicies.policyTitle: Bringing new flights to our region
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Including restoring links to Heathrow - through work with airlines and Inverness Airport to promote our region to operators.
Delivering the successful conclusion of the £315 million City Region Deal by working with both Governments, to bring investment to the Highlands.
Through work with mobile operators and both Governments, to advance better connectivity in our communities.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Solutions to end unfair delivery charges
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Took the first bills of its type by a Highland MP to Parliament, to provide a solution to excessive delivery charges.

issues.brexitEurope: Drew's commitment to making sure that Highland migrants feel welcome in Scotland is very important to me.

community.content: Through work with mobile operators and both Governments, to advance better connectivity in our communities.

endorsements.endorsement: Drew Hendry has been an outstanding constituency MP. Frequently at the forefront of issues such as connectivity, social justice, fighting austerity and attracting investment to the region. Now that he has established himself in Westminster we can help him to continue the traction by re-electing Drew on June 8th as our Member of Parliament.

Drew was a huge help to my family during the time of my accident in Vietnam, and has been a great support during my recovery. He attended meetings with my parents and the insurance company to help resolve the matter and has been there throughout, offering honest advice and help throughout my recovery and to get justice for what happened to me.

When I and three other merchant navy cadets were stranded on a container ship near Singapore, Drew provided invaluable assistance - putting pressure on the UK Government to act quickly and keeping in regular contact with us whilst initially leading us to getting home.

After many phone calls and countless emails sent trying to get an answer as to why my new home had no phoneline provision put in place, Drew was the only person to take the problem on board and help me resolve this issue. He was the only reason I now have this essential of household life.

The help that Drew has given me has been invaluable. As a working parent and business owner affected by anti-social behaviour, it's very hard to find someone who can appreciate the personal challenges that this level of persistent and constant fighting has given.

Drew's commitment to making sure that Highland migrants feel welcome in Scotland is very important to me. As someone whose background is Polish and with an extremely young family to look after, I think that Highlanders like me need to feel safe and confident that if re-elected, he will continue to fight London's position of EU migrants' rights.

examples: Delivering the successful conclusion of the £315 million City Region Deal by working with both Governments, to bring investment to the Highlands.

Making sure we live where our services are our own, such as Ship-to-Ship Transfers, HMRC job losses, and local bank closures.
Supporting families against the Universal Credit rollout.
Bringing new flights to our region
Securing investment for the Highlands

Connecting our community through better communication services
